body:
---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install vtk

Could NOT find Eigen3 (missing: EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR EIGEN3_VERSION
            _OK)
     143      (Required is at least version "2.91.0")
     144    Call Stack (most recent call first):

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux login04 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Nov 8 23:39:32 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64
title: Installation issue: vtk
